cast.original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
cast.overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
cast.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

cast.overview: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, while defending Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.
cast.title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps

details.biography: Julia Garner is an American actress. She has appeared in the films Martha Marcy May Marlene, The Perks of Being a Wallflower, Sin City: A Dame to Kill For, and We Are What We Are.
details.name: Julia Garner
details.place_of_birth: The Bronx, New York City, New York, USA
